content.title: Build fast, responsive sites with Bootstrap
content.subtitle: Install via package manager
content.content:
Powerful, extensible, and feature-packed frontend toolkit. Build and customize with Sass, utilize prebuilt grid
        system and components, and bring projects to life with powerful JavaScript plugins. Currently v5.3.8 · Download · All releases Jump right into building with Bootstrap—use the CDN, install it via package manager, or download the source code.

headings.text: Build fast, responsive sites with Bootstrap
headings.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Powerful, extensible, and feature-packed frontend toolkit. Build and customize with Sass, utilize prebuilt grid
        system and components, and bring projects to life with powerful JavaScript plugins.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Currently v5.3.8 · Download · All releases
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Jump right into building with Bootstrap—use the CDN, install it via package manager, or download the source code.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Read installation docs
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Install Bootstrap’s source Sass and JavaScript files via npm, RubyGems, Composer, or Meteor. Package-managed
      installs don’t include documentation or our full build scripts. You can also use any demo from our Examples repo to quickly jumpstart Bootstrap projects.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Read our installation docs for more info and additional
      package managers.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
When you only need to include Bootstrap’s compiled CSS or JS, you can use jsDelivr. See it in action with our simple quick start, or browse the examples to jumpstart your next project. You can also
      choose to include Popper and our JS separately.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Get a jump on including Bootstrap's source files in a new project with our official guides.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Bootstrap utilizes Sass for a modular and customizable architecture. Import only the components you need, enable
    global options like gradients and shadows, and write your own CSS with our variables, maps, functions, and mixins.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Learn more about customizing
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Import one stylesheet and you're off to the races with every feature of our CSS.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Learn more about our global Sass options.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: The easiest way to customize Bootstrap—include only the CSS you need.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Learn more about using Bootstrap with Sass.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Bootstrap 5 is evolving with each release to better utilize CSS variables for global theme styles, individual
      components, and even utilities. We provide dozens of variables for colors, font styles, and more at a :root level for use anywhere. On components and utilities, CSS variables are scoped to the relevant class and can easily
      be modified.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Learn more about CSS variables
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Use any of our global :root variables to write new styles. CSS variables use the var(--bs-variableName) syntax and can be inherited by children
        elements.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Override global, component, or utility class variables to customize Bootstrap just how you like. No need to
        redeclare each rule, just a new variable value.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
New in Bootstrap 5, our utilities are now generated by our Utility API. We built it as a feature-packed Sass map that can be quickly and easily customized. It's never been easier to
      add, remove, or modify any utility classes. Make utilities responsive, add pseudo-class variants, and give them
      custom names.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Apply any of our included utility classes to our components to customize their appearance, like the navigation
        example below. There are hundreds of classes available—from positioning and sizing to colors and effects. Mix them with CSS variable overrides for
        even more control.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Explore customized components
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Use Bootstrap's utility API to modify any of our included utilities or create your own custom utilities for any
        project. Import Bootstrap first, then use Sass map functions to modify, add, or remove utilities.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Explore the utility API
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Add toggleable hidden elements, modals and offcanvas menus, popovers and tooltips, and so much more—all without
      jQuery. Bootstrap's JavaScript is HTML-first, meaning most plugins are added with data attributes in your
      HTML. Need more control? Include individual plugins programmatically.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Learn more about Bootstrap JavaScript
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Why write more JavaScript when you can write HTML? Nearly all of Bootstrap's JavaScript plugins feature a
        first-class data API, allowing you to use JavaScript just by adding data attributes.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Learn more about our JavaScript as modules and using the programmatic API.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Bootstrap features a dozen plugins that you can drop into any project. Drop them in all at once, or choose just
        the ones you need.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text:
Bootstrap Icons is an open source SVG icon library featuring over 1,800 glyphs, with
      more added every release. They're designed to work in any project, whether you use Bootstrap itself or not. Use them
      as SVGs or icon fonts—both options give you vector scaling and easy customization via CSS.
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

paragraphs.text: Get Bootstrap Icons
paragraphs.fontFamily: system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"

cards.title: Get Security Updates for Bootstrap 3 & 4
cards.description:
Powerful, extensible, and feature-packed frontend toolkit. Build and customize with Sass, utilize prebuilt grid
        system and components, and bring projects to life with powerful JavaScript plugins.

cards.title: Read the docs
cards.description: Jump right into building with Bootstrap—use the CDN, install it via package manager, or download the source code.

cards.title: All releases
cards.description:
Install Bootstrap’s source Sass and JavaScript files via npm, RubyGems, Composer, or Meteor. Package-managed
      installs don’t include documentation or our full build scripts. You can also use any demo from our Examples repo to quickly jumpstart Bootstrap projects.

Read our installation docs for more info and additional
      package managers.

cards.title: ads via Carbon
cards.description:
When you only need to include Bootstrap’s compiled CSS or JS, you can use jsDelivr. See it in action with our simple quick start, or browse the examples to jumpstart your next project. You can also
      choose to include Popper and our JS separately.

cards.title: Read installation docs
cards.description: Get a jump on including Bootstrap's source files in a new project with our official guides.

cards.title: use any demo from our Examples repo
cards.description:
Bootstrap utilizes Sass for a modular and customizable architecture. Import only the components you need, enable
    global options like gradients and shadows, and write your own CSS with our variables, maps, functions, and mixins.
cards.button_text: use any demo from our Examples repo

cards.description: Import one stylesheet and you're off to the races with every feature of our CSS.

cards.title: Read our installation docs
cards.description: Learn more about our global Sass options.

sections.title: Build fast, responsive sites with Bootstrap
sections.subtitle: Get started any way you want
sections.multi_column_text:
Install via package manager
Include via CDN
Read our getting started guides

hoverEffects.css: color: var(--bs-btn-hover-color); background-color: var(--bs-btn-hover-bg); border-color: var(--bs-btn-hover-border-color);
color: var(--bs-btn-color); background-color: var(--bs-btn-bg); border-color: var(--bs-btn-border-color);
z-index: 2; color: var(--bs-pagination-hover-color); background-color: var(--bs-pagination-hover-bg); border-color: var(--bs-pagination-hover-border-color);
z-index: 1; color: var(--bs-list-group-action-hover-color); text-decoration: none; background-color: var(--bs-list-group-action-hover-bg);
color: var(--bs-btn-close-color); text-decoration: none; opacity: var(--bs-btn-close-hover-opacity);
color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration: none; outline: 0px; opacity: 0.9;
